nodes.text: The Meria system was a star system that was located within the freestanding subsectors area of the Mid Rim. The system shared its name with the items known as Merian tricorn hooves, which were believed to be fake by the smuggler Han Solo.
The Meria system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square H-15.
